name: Mner Club
description: Mner Club is a specialised RWA management platform that integrates real world assets with blockchain technology to issue, purchase, manage and distribute various RWA assets. By exploring a range of practical application scenarios for RWA assets, we can significantly improve its composability and provide a bedrock for the Decentralized Finance industry. The platform addresses the challenge faced by common models in the industry based on simple token subsidy and incentive by introducing positive externalities and interoperable asset models.
